District Policy - iPad & Other Electronic Devices

span.style: font-family :sans-serif, Arial, Verdana, \'Trebuchet MS\'; font-size :9pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;background-color: ; color: black;

p.strong: We understand that at times, you or your child may experience technical difficulties. We will do our best to help you through each situation, but please understand that some instances may be out of our control (like a Schoology server issue) or the issue may take longer to address than others. In order to assist, please follow these guidelines:

li.strong: If there is a hardware question, such as an issue with your iPad, please fill out the Helpdesk ticket by clicking here.
If there are questions around Curriculum like apps, please reach out to your teachers. If they are unable to assist, they will complete a helpdesk ticket to our IT department.
